00025 #ifndef AERYN_XCODE_REPORT_HPP
00026 #define AERYN_XCODE_REPORT_HPP
00027 
00028 #include <aeryn/verbose_report.hpp>
00029 #include <fstream>
00030 
00031 namespace Aeryn
00032 {
00042         //[THADDAUES] thinking about build system integration
00043         // - don't to run tests when nothing has changed
00044         //   so: drop "test pass cookie", and tell build system about it
00045         // - is this useful for more than Xcode?
00046         // - is there a better way to do this?
00047         // - dropping a file "cookie" orthoganal to report type.
00048         template< class BaseReportT = Aeryn::VerboseReport >
00049         class XcodeReport : public BaseReportT
00050         {
00051         public:
00057                 explicit XcodeReport
00058                         ( std::ostream& out, 
00059                           const std::string& cookieFileName  )
00060                 : BaseReportT( out ),
00061                   mCookieFileName( cookieFileName )
00062                 {
00063                 }
00064 
00070                 virtual void EndTesting
00071                         ( unsigned long testCount, 
00072                           unsigned long failureCount )
00073                 {
00074                         BaseReportT::EndTesting( testCount, failureCount, failureCount );
00075                         
00076                         if (!failureCount)
00077                         {
00078                                 //drop cookie
00079                                 std::ofstream cookie( mCookieFileName.c_str() );
00080                                 cookie << "Passed: " << testCount << " tests\n";
00081                         }
00082                 }
00083 
00084         private:
00086                 const std::string mCookieFileName;
00087         };      
00088 }
00089 
00090 #endif // AERYN_XCODE_REPORT_HPP
